text: By adding additional parallel energy chambers, Warlock Engineers can fire the devastating Warp Lightning faster. However, due to incomplete insulation between the chambers, heat conduction issues remain unavoidable.

The staff wielded by Warlock Engineers functions as a miniature Warp Lightning Cannon. Increasing the purity of the Warpstone core directly enhances the energy density and firing precision of Warp Lightning.

The Energy Diverter harnesses residual energy from each Warp Lightning discharge, redirecting it to charge the staff's blades and energy shields. This allows Warlock Engineers to face even the mightiest of beasts head-on.
